noSubs: There are no channels subscribed to.
intro:
Creta can be used in a variety of ways as users imagine. 
Signage, presentation, electronic blackboard, video conferencing, etc. 
Experience directly according to each purpose.
inventWhen: When was the Creta Book published
prot1:
Anyone can design easily and simply 
even if you are not a designer
prot2:
Collaborate efficiently with team members 
and manage your work systematically
prot3:
If you want to know more about Creta, 
experience it now without logging in!
commu1:
Designed content can be easily shared 
and communicated!
commu2:
You can immediately display the content 
designed in various devices!
idea:
Watch a variety of Creta Books and 
get new ideas.
easy:
Easily create presentation materials 
in Creta Studio.
share2:
Share the presentation materials you created 
in the community.
presen2:
Present the presentation materials using 
the whiteboard and conference functions.
studio3: Multiple people at the same time
studio4:
Multiple users can edit one Creta Book 
at the same time.
studio6:
You can send the content designed in the studio 
directly to the registered device.
community2:
Watch a variety of Creta Books and 
get new ideas.
community4:
Share the Creta Book you created on your channel 
and communicate with users around the world.
community6:
Subscribe to your favorite creators and 
save and watch your favorite Creta Books.
free1:
Unleash your imagination with Creta. 
Start for free now!

genderBirthYearQuestion: What is your gender and year of birth?
